Key Match Events: The Pelicans took a 15-point halftime lead
The Pelicans made 18 three-pointers in consecutive games for the first time all season
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Green praised the team's defensive effort, stating that it helped them get off to a good start and allowed them to get in transition
Coach Green mentioned that the first quarter points were 33 and it was really off their defense, getting steals, finishing possessions when they contest shots
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans swept the season series with the Washington Wizards
The Pelicans won back-to-back games for the first time since the year's first two games
Trey Murphy III turned his ankle and was ruled out of the game
Others: The Pelicans are finally starting to knock some outside shots down
The Pelicans played Sunday's game without Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram
